# Human² AI Training
## 8-Week AI Mastery Program for Creative Strategists
### Week 1: Foundations

---

## Slide 1: Title
Human² AI Training - 8-Week AI Mastery Program for Creative Strategists - Week 1: Foundations

## Slide 2: Who Are We?
- Co-Founders at Human²
- Built AI workflows for Unilever & Virgin
- We train teams to make better ads with AI

## Slide 3-4: Course Logistics & Schedule
*(Course logistics and scheduling information)*

## Slide 5-6: Survey Response
Thank you for your responses on the form. Overall, many people are interested in AI workflows + streamlining creative ops. That's what this program is all about.

## Slide 7-8: Why This Is Important
This is the most pivotal moment to learn AI.

## Slide 9: Sam Altman Quote
> "95% of creative work will be done by AI in 5 years" - Sam Altman

## Slide 10: Before You Disagree...
Let me show you where we are & where we are going

## Slide 11: Current Creative Ops Process
The traditional workflow

## Slide 12: Where AI Excels in Creative Ops
AI is particularly strong at research, with growing capabilities across all stages

## Slide 13: The Future Vision
Personally, I think he's right. Sort of. AI will execute. Humans will direct.

## Slide 14: This Is Where We Are Today

## Slide 15-16: Research - Where AI Shines
First, let's look at research - where AI truly shines for creative strategists.
- **Reddit Answers:** AI-powered insights from Reddit discussions

## Slide 17: Deep Research
Comprehensive AI-powered research capabilities

## Slide 18: Research Workflows
Build custom research automation. Other research opportunities come from building workflows within Gumloop or n8n, which we will touch on in weeks 6 & 7!

## Slide 19: Vibe Marketer
For other research workflows, check out Vibe Marketer

## Slide 20-21: Design
This entire presentation was built by AI. Just me prompting.

## Slides 22-24: AI Design Examples
- Deep Heat - Joint Pain Relief
- Flakes - Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
- Opopop - Popcorn Reimagined

## Slide 25: AI Progress
Oh and FYI, this is what AI images looked like 4 years ago. It's only getting better.

Video editing is coming too. Prompt to video edit.

## Slides 29-31: Reporting & Iterations
- Motion agents
- Moby

## Slide 32-34: The Future
But it's going to get even crazier. AI workflows and AI agents are next.
- **Icon:** https://x.com/kennandavison/status/1915450754434797914

## Slides 35-39: Where Are We Going?
- Employees will have dozens of agents
- We'll be able to talk with these agents
- And this will be across the entire team
- Like I emphasized right away, humans, for a long time, will always need to direct AI. But AI will do all the work for us.

## Slide 40: The Future of Work
Strategic thinking over tactical execution:
- Knowing what to design > how to design it
- Knowing what ad to make > how to create it
- Knowing what video to shoot > how to shoot it
- Knowing what headline to use > thinking of it
- **Strategy becomes everything.**

## Slide 41: About This Program
This 8-week program is your guide to mastering AI. No matter where you are at.

## Slide 42: 5 Steps to Mastering AI
1. Awareness
2. Prompting
3. AI tool usage
4. AI workflows
5. AI systems

## Slide 43: 8-Week Curriculum
Structured learning path:
- **Week 1:** Awareness + foundations
- **Weeks 2, 3, 4:** Prompting + Context Libraries
- **Week 5:** AI tools
- **Week 6 & 7:** AI workflows
- **Week 8:** AI systems

## Slide 44-45: AI Awareness
Understanding the landscape. One of the most important aspects of mastering AI is to just know what changes are happening.

**Resource:** [The Ultimate AI x Ecommerce Resource Library](https://human2.notion.site/The-Ultimate-AI-x-Ecommerce-Resource-Library-2096932e8fe2806e9f2ef207d71c5412?source=copy_link)

---

## Tool Stack (Slides 46-53)

### Recommended Tools for DTC Marketing Teams:

1. **ChatGPT**
   - Deep Research
   - Image Gen
   - Soon: Operator

2. **Claude**
   - Copywriting + marketing
   - Custom Claude Projects

3. **Poppy AI**
   - Static ad inspo
   - Ad recreation tool
   - SO much more

4. **Gumloop**
   - AI workflow builder
   - This is where you get to really start to do everything
   - It connects all your tools together

5. **Motion** (optional)
   - AI creative strategists
   - Breakdown on how your ads are performing
   - If you are not running ads, then Motion is not necessary

6. **Triple Whale** (optional)
   - Agent builder - talk to all of your data
   - Tons of value for high-level information

---

## Learning AI (Slides 54-59)

### The Fastest Way to Learn AI
The fastest way to learn AI is to start using it.

### Learning Style Recommendations:
- **Audio learner:** Use Notebook LM
- **Visual learner:** Claude
- **Learn by talking:** Notebook LM

### Exercise!
Choose one of these platforms, and build something that you can learn. This doesn't have to be work. This could be fitness, sleep, Netflix recommender, date night planner, etc.

## What's Next (Slides 60-61)

### Week 2: Intro to Prompting

### Homework Before Next Week:
Before next week, I want you to:
1. Go through the Notion doc I sent you
2. Follow some of the accounts
3. Find ONE thing that is interesting
4. Build an AI tool within Claude or Notebook LM
